Python scripting quick help

Please see this blog post:
http://wiki.ship.scea.com/confluence/display/WWSSDKATF/2012/05/18/Scripting+your+app+with+Python

And take a look at the Python scripts used by our automated functional tests. These can be found in this Visual Studio solution file:
\Test\Everything.*.sln
And in the \Tests\FunctionalTests directory.
